text: Cue is a store that sells modern fashion clothing. It was first opened in 1968 in Sydney, Australia. Cue designs are created by its own team in Surry Hills, Sydney, and the clothes are mostly made in Australia. Cue also works with fabric mills in Europe to create unique fabrics and prints. Cue has stores in many cities across Australia and New Zealand, and also has a store in the exclusive department store Myer. Cue has won many awards, such as the Prix de Marie Claire Awards, Grazia Fashion Awards, and Myer Supplier of the Year Awards. They have also won awards for their customer experience and in-store initiatives. == References == Category:Clothing companies of Australia Category:1968 establishments in Australia
title: Cue (clothing)
